scripts.test:travis: lerna run build && nyc mocha "libraries/bot*/tests/*.test.js" && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test:travis-broken: lerna run set-version && npm run set-dependency-versions && lerna run build && nyc mocha "libraries/bot*/tests/*.test.js" && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.set-dependency-versions: node tools/util/updateDependenciesInPackageJsons.js ./libraries ${Version} botbuilder botbuilder-choices botbuilder-prompts botframework-connector botframework-luis botframework-schema
scripts.update-versions: lerna run set-version && npm run set-dependency-versions
